Great restaurant, maybe the best in Nuwara. Food excellent, variety of drinks, super ambience in restaurant and on terrace, so friendly staff. If we would stay longer we would come here everyday. We enjoyed a lunch and a dinner.

Would give this place a higher rating if we could. We loved the vibe, the enthusiastic staff, the superb menu choice with lots of veggie options. The open fire was also a blessing on this cold, wet January night in Sri Lanka!
